column3: activate the session scope when looking up AbstractLifecycleParticipant to fix broken  dependency resolution

@vladsoroka Do you need any help to get this merged?
This is a showstopper for all IntelliJ users in my current project (and all other projects that depend on such maven extensions).
Thanks for the contribution! I've merged the change using the following commit c99273c
Also I've extracted the executeWithMavenSession method to the common module to reuse it for newer maven verions >= 3.6, see the commit at 35dc1cd
